AI Description: ColossalAI is an open-source deep learning framework that focuses on large-scale distributed training and efficient model serving. It provides a unified platform for researchers and practitioners to build, train, and deploy deep learning models at scale.
Core Features:
1. Large-scale distributed training capabilities
2. Efficient model serving for deployment
3. Unified platform for building and training deep learning models
4. Support for a wide range of deep learning architectures and algorithms
General Tags: Deep Learning Framework, Large-Scale Training, Model Serving
